snippet.title: DCS: КA-50 BLACK SHARK 3
snippet.description:
We are pleased to announce the DCS: Black Shark 3 upgrade is now available.  Watch the DCS: Black Shark 3 trailer here. For those of you that already own DCS: Black Shark 2, you can upgrade to DCS: Black Shark 3 for only $9.99 USD until mid-March 2023. Thereafter the upgrade price will increase to $19.99 USD. The full price for this fanatic module is $69.99 USD. Enjoy! 

Shop: https://www.digitalcombatsimulator.com/en/shop/modules/black_shark_3

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2214600/DCS_Black_Shark_3/

☑ Site: http://digitalcombatsimulator.com/ 
☑ Twitter: https://twitter.com/eagledynamics/
☑ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/eagle.dynamics/
☑ Forum: https://forum.dcs.world/

#dcsworld 

If purchasing the Black Shark 3 upgrade, please be sure to first log into the DCS World account that was used to purchase Black Shark 2 from this eShop. Also, note that the upgrade is not valid for a gifted module.  If you still run into a problem, please contact our tech support here:  https://www.digitalcombatsimulator.com/en/support/
